content.question: The rate of change of the volume <math alttext="V" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow></math> with respect to time <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></math> of water leaking from a tank is proportional to the cube of the volume. Which of the following is a differential equation that could describe this relationship?

choices.label: <math alttext="the derivative of V, with respect to t, equals, negative 1.4 times t cubed" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1.4</mn></mrow><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the derivative of V, with respect to t, equals, negative 0.2 times V cubed" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>0.2</mn></mrow><msup><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the derivative of V, with respect to t, equals, 0.75 times t cubed" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.75</mn><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the derivative of V, with respect to t, equals, 0.15 times V cubed" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.15</mn><msup><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the derivative of V, with respect to t, equals, negative 0.2 times V cubed" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>0.2</mn></mrow><msup><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></math>

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Identify a re-expression of mathematical information presented in a given representation
